About: Founded in 1862, The Hong Kong and China Gas Company Limited (Towngas) is Hong Kong's first public utility with a focus on innovation and environmental friendliness, maintaining this position as Asia’s leading clean energy supplier and quality service provider. 2022 marks a new milestone for Towngas with its 160th anniversary. In line with our philosophy of “Smart Energy for a Brighter Future“, Towngas is the first Hong Kong public utility launching a free NFT project with an initial release of 10,000 unique commemorative NFTs, thus an anniversary lucky draw to give away 160 fabulous prizes!
COD: To promote the development of local creative industries, Towngas collaborated with young local artist, Tracy Liu. All NFTs are collectible digital artworks that showcase Towngas iconic gas appliances with local elements.

Faq.A1: NFT, stands for “Non-fungible Token”, is an one-of-a-kind digital asset with a certificate of ownership that can be traded and recorded in any blockchain.
Faq.A2: Good crypto asset management practices are suggested when redeeming your Towngas 160th Anniversary NFT. Please do not share your virtual wallet account and secret recovery phrase with anyone, select a trustable trading platform to sell the NFTs and avoid clicking on suspicious links or linking your wallet to malicious websites.
Faq.Q3: How many Towngas 160th Anniversary NFT will be available?
Faq.A3: Towngas will launch a total of 10,000 NFTs. Each NFT will be entitled to a lucky draw entry, while stocks last.
Faq.Q4: When will the Towngas 160th Anniversary NFTs be issued?
Faq.A4: The event starts on 11 August 2022 at 12 a.m. and closes on 11 September 2022 at 11:59 p.m. (Hong Kong time).
Faq.Q5: How many NFT can I get?
Faq.A5: Each Participant can redeem one free NFT and one lucky draw entry. During the event period, when purchasing gas appliances through Towngas (applicable to Towngas Customer Centre, outdoor sales booths, online and telephone orders, excluding dealers and agents), an additional NFT and lucky draw entry will be granted by filling in the sales order number and purchase date after verified by the staff. Each eligible Participant can only participate in the event once and receive a maximum of two NFTs and two lucky draw entries. If the same sales order number is used for more than once, his/her registration will be disqualified
Faq.Q6: When will the results of lucky draw be announced?
Faq.A6: The results will be announced on Towngas Appliance Facebook page, published on September 16, 2022 in The Standard and Sing Tao Daily.
Faq.Q7: How to set up a MetaMask wallet?
Faq.A7: Please click here to read the guideline on registration of MetaMask.
Faq.Q8: Is there any handling fee for redeeming a Towngas 160th Anniversary NFT?
Faq.A8: No, your Towngas 160th Anniversary NFT will be airdropped to the provided wallet address directly.
Faq.Q9: Can I withdraw and transfer my Towngas 160th Anniversary NFT? What are the restrictions?
Faq.A9: Yes, you can transfer your Towngas 160th Anniversary NFT and trade it on the NFT marketplace, OpenSea after prize redemption. If you transfer or sell your NFT before the lucky draw, you will not be eligible to participate in the 'Towngas 160th Anniversary Smart Energy for a Brighter Future NFT Lucky Draw'. Winners should contain the commemorative NFT in their registered virtual wallet address at the time of prize collection.
